modName: Spirit of Tiber Septim - Summonable Ghost Companion
summary: This mod adds a spell tome to Markarth Shrine of Talos, and by reading this spell tome you will learn a spell to summon Spirit of Tiber Septim to your side.
descriptionHtml: The spell tome can be found in Markarth Shrine of Talos, and when read allows you to conjure Spirit of Tiber Septim. The spirit can use Unrelenting Force and Firebreath Shouts and scales with your level. The spell will take 4 seconds to cast and will cost ~200 magicka. The summon will last until death or 300 seconds.
author: ankkamus
